item.title: How Confident Are We that Masks "Work"? Confidence Functions and the DANMASK-19 Study
item.description: Gelmanâ€™s post library(clp) # p[1] = rate of SARS-CoV-2 in control arm # p[2] = rate of SARS-CoV-2 in intervention arm x <- c(53, 42) n <- c(2470, 2392) conf.diff.props <- clp::prop.conf(x = x, n = n) conf.diff.props$qconf(0.5)*100 ## [1] 0.3899442 conf.diff.props$qconf(c(0.025, 0.975))*100 ## [1] -0.3880645 1.2092257 conf.diff.props$pcurve(0) ## [1] 0.3261612 conf.rel.risk <- clp::riskratio.conf(x, n) conf.rel.risk$qconf(0.5) ## [1] 0.8182709 conf.rel.risk$qconf(c(0.025, 0.975)) ## [1] 0.5493596 1.2186575 conf.rel.risk$pcurve(1) ## [1] 0.
